description.japanese: 鍵のかかったドアを破壊する

description.schinese: 破坏一扇锁住的门

description.english: As a Klown, smash 30 windows
description.german: Zerschlage 30 Fenster als Klown
description.french: En tant que Klown, casse 30 fenêtres
description.italian: Come Klown, sfonda 30 finestre
description.spanish: Como payaso, rompe 30 ventanas
description.japanese: ピエロとして窓を30個壊す
description.brazilian: Como Palhaço, quebre 30 janelas
description.schinese: 作为小丑，打碎 30 扇窗户

displayName.japanese: ポップコーントラッカー

description.english: Kill a human that is covered in popcorn
description.german: Töte einen Menschen, der mit Popcorn bedeckt ist
description.french: Tue un humain recouvert de popcorn
description.italian: Uccidi un essere umano ricoperto di popcorn
description.spanish: Mata a un humano que esté cubierto de palomitas
description.japanese: ポップコーンに埋もれた人間をキルする
description.brazilian: Mate um humano coberto de pipoca
description.schinese: 击杀一个被爆米花覆盖的人类

description.english: As a Brawler, Knock a Human's block off using the boxing gloves
description.german: Versetze als Schläger einem Menschen mit den Boxhandschuhen einen heftigen Hieb
description.french: En tant que Brawler, éclate la tête d'un humain à l'aide des gants de boxe
description.italian: Come brawler, fai saltare la testa a un essere umano usando i guantoni da boxe
description.spanish: Como Brawler, arráncale la cabeza a un humano con los guantes de boxeo
description.japanese: 接近型としてボクシンググローブで人間をめった打ちにする
description.brazilian: Como Lutador, arranque a cabeça de um Humano usando luvas de boxe
description.schinese: 作为斗士，使用拳击手套打掉一个人类的脑袋

description.english: Hit a human with a thrown cocoon
description.german: Triff einen Menschen mit einem geworfenen Kokon
description.french: Lance un cocon sur un humain
description.italian: Colpisci un essere umano lanciando un bozzolo
description.spanish: Lánzale un capullo a un humano
description.japanese: 繭を人間に投げつける
description.brazilian: Atinja um humano com um casulo arremessado
description.schinese: 使用投掷的茧击中一个人类
